description: This is a React component implemented in TypeScript that serves as the main page for a notes application. It manages the state of notes, handles user authentication redirection, and provides functionality for creating, editing, and deleting notes with integration to API utilities. The component uses various UI components for layout, modal dialogs, loaders, and buttons, and integrates with context providers for modal and authentication management.

methods.name: HomePage
methods.description: Main React component for the notes page, managing state and user interactions.
